content: [{"id":"boPg_-oQOX","type":"header","data":{"text":"EpiBus","col":12}},{"id":"LEfpIArEmD","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"EpiBus is a MODBUS Integration for Epinomy and ERPNext.  It allows you to control manufacturing hardware like Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), Robots and other devices that support the MODBUS protocol. ","col":12}},{"id":"caExZmdfT9","type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Modbus Settings","col":5}},{"id":"DqK8wkoHQF","type":"header","data":{"text":"Modbus Documents","col":12}},{"id":"fI6Hh2Ueq2","type":"quick_list","data":{"quick_list_name":"Modbus Connections","col":6}},{"id":"OlilxW5QK5","type":"quick_list","data":{"quick_list_name":"Modbus Actions","col":6}}]
label: EpiBus
name: EpiBus
